feed.title: My First Blog
feed.subtitle: This is my first attempt to build a static site using Jekyll. This is the first step into the larger world of website building for me.

entry.title: First Post Try
entry.content:
layout: post title: “First Post Attempt” date: 2019-06-18 14:22:08 -0400 categories:

This is my first original post using a Jekyll Static Site.

I look forward to mastering how to use Jekyll and build good static site
entry.summary: layout: post title: “First Post Attempt” date: 2019-06-18 14:22:08 -0400 categories: This is my first original post using a Jekyll Static Site.
